meta.description: PGP Individual UID Signer (PIUS), quickly and easily sign UIDs on a set of PGP keys

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v2.0 only

meta.long_description:
This software will allow you to quickly and easily sign each UID on
        a set of PGP keys.  It is designed to take the pain out of the
        sign-all-the-keys part of PGP Keysigning Party while adding security
        to the process.
meta.name: pius

meta.description: PGP Individual UID Signer (PIUS), quickly and easily sign UIDs on a set of PGP keys
